articles.author: AFP
articles.title: British novelist Hilary Mantel to seek Irish citizenship 'to become a European again' - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The writer has Irish roots through her grandparents.
articles.content:
WOLF HALL AUTHOR Hilary Mantel says she plans to take up Irish citizenship, to become a European again after Brexit.
Mantel, the first British writer to win the Booker Prize twice, also attacked Pri… [+2155 chars]

articles.title: 'Stagflation' is the greatest threat to Europe’s recovery, warns ex-Italian PM Monti - CNBC
articles.description: Former Italian Prime Minister Mario Monti believes the greatest threat to Europe's economic recovery from the coronavirus pandemic is stagflation.
articles.content:
Former Italian Prime Minister Mario Monti told CNBC Saturday that he believes the greatest threat to Europe's economic recovery from the coronavirus pandemic is "stagflation."
Monti, now the preside… [+1978 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Farrell
articles.title: Le Pen to 'threaten' EU with French exit: Brussels membership to be used as crucial tool - Daily Express
articles.description: FRENCH presidential hopeful and eurosceptic Marine Le Pen will use France's membership of the European Union as a tool to get her own way, a former rear admiral has claimed.

articles.author: Brian Keogh
articles.title: Leona Maguire earns captain's confidence ahead of historic Solheim Cup appearance - Independent.ie
articles.description: Leona Maguire has been handed a massive vote of confidence by European skipper Catriona Matthew and a dream debut alongside Mel Reid against superstar sisters Nelly and Jessica Korda in the opening Solheim Cup foursomes session in Ohio today.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: EU and AstraZeneca reach deal to end vaccine delivery dispute - 9News
articles.description: The European Union and drugmaker AstraZeneca said Friday that they reached a deal to end a damaging legal battle over the slow pace of deliveries of the company's COVID-19 vaccines.
